participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Reflective and sentimental, Lila often draws from her past experiences in conversations.
participant_1.background: I will make people think of the past when they see my long hair and the story they will hear will be about my father leaving. My wife is legally deaf. I had a girlfriend who eloped with my best friend one day. I am a 30 year old female. I have been working the same job for two years.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake has a light-hearted sense of humor and enjoys solitude, often using jokes to lift his spirits.
participant_2.background: I make jokes to cheer myself up. I graduated college for secondary English education. I'm allergic to lactose. I like that my current job is mostly solitary. I enjoy a day of fishing on my viking boat.

content.text: Not much. Just hanging out, fishing. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. So, what do you like to fish for?
I like to fish for salmon, trout, and bass. What about you?
I like to fish for salmon too. I also like to fish for catfish and bass.
Nice. What's your favorite type of fishing?
I like to go fly fishing. I think it's the most challenging and rewarding type of fishing.
I've never tried fly fishing before. I've heard it's really hard.
It's not as hard as it looks. It just takes some practice.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the suggestion. I'll keep that in mind.
No problem. So, what do you do for work?
I'm a secondary English education teacher.
That's cool. I've always thought about becoming a teacher.
It's a lot of fun. I love working with kids.
